title: UTF-8Letterlike Symbols

metadata.description: Learn about UTF-8Letterlike Symbols with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Hex 2100-214F / Decimal 8448-8527 If you want any of these characters displayed in HTML, you can use the HTML entity found in the table below. If the character does not have an HTML entity, you can use the decimal (dec) or hexadecimal (hex) reference. Example

I will display ™

I will display ™

I will display ™

summary: This tutorial covers UTF-8Letterlike Symbols concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use UTF-8Letterlike Symbols effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of UTF-8Letterlike Symbols and how to apply it in your projects.
